display.title: I'm Fetching Me Mallet!
description: A feature of the &&5Soft Mallet&&r that you may be aware of is its ability to &&6pause machines&&r. However, did you know that if you &&bsneak whilst pausing a machine&&r, it'll tell the machine to continue operating until it finishes its recipe?
This is &&2perfect&&r if you need to make changes to a multiblock but don't want to &&evoid items&&r, as unforming a multiblock will void all inputs.
